...又称回跃反应,rebound reaction,如长期服用可乐定降血压,停药次日血压将明显回升, 特异质反应,idiosyncratic reaction,  [1] 3研究内容新药的药效学研究主要指对其药理作用的观测和作用机理的探讨,内容包.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from idiosyncrasy, on the pattern of Greek sunkratikos 'mixed together'

entry.def: If you describe someone's actions or characteristics as idiosyncratic, you mean that they are rather unusual.

example.tran: 他古怪的打字与奇特的拼写

sentences.sentence: "we all have our own idiosyncratic gestures"
